title: Level 5 Product Catalogue Digital Optimization
briefDescription: Product catalogue transformation from print-focused to digital-optimized format with enhanced readability and UX.
description: Level 5's product catalogue looked great in print but was unreadable on screens. We transformed it from print-first design to digital-optimized format that actually serves modern customers who read catalogues on devices, not paper.
challenge: Here's a common problem: Level 5's catalogue was designed for print when most customers read it digitally. Small text that looked fine on paper became unreadable at 100% screen scale. Two-page spreads that worked in print created terrible user experience on devices. They needed digital-first thinking, not print-first compromise.
solution: Complete restructure prioritizing how people actually use catalogues today. Significantly increased body text font size for comfortable reading at 100% digital scale. Split two-page spreads into single pages for natural digital navigation. Added branded footer elements for consistent company recognition. Every change focused on user experience without sacrificing professionalism.
results: Dramatically improved readability at 100% digital scale
Enhanced user experience through single-page digital format
Successful digital-first approach serving modern customer behavior
Professional branded footer integration reinforcing company identity
Increased customer engagement with product information
Future-ready catalogue design for ongoing digital distribution
brandMessage: Don't force digital customers to struggle with print-first design. We optimize for how people actually use your materials today.
